DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.po_quote_header p left join xbs.po_rfq_header p0 on p.po_rfq_header_id=p0.po_rfq_header_id left join xbs.option_line o on p.quote_type=o.option_line_id left join xbs.supplier s on p.supplier_id=s.supplier_id left join xbs.supplier_site s0 on p.supplier_site_id=s0.supplier_site_id left join xbs.payment_term p1 on p.payment_term_id=p1.payment_term_id left join xbs.address a on p.ship_to_id=a.address_id left join xbs.address a0 on p.bill_to_id=a0.address_id left join xbs.currency c on p.currency=c.currency_id left join xbs.option_line o0 on p.quote_status=o0.option_line_id
DbDetails.Data: p.quote_number,p0.rfq_name po_rfq_header_id,o.option_line_value quote_type,s.supplier_name supplier_id,s0.supplier_site_name supplier_site_id,p1.payment_term payment_term_id,a.address ship_to_id,a0.address bill_to_id,c.title currency,p.effective_start_date,p.effective_end_date,p.valid_date,p.description,p.rev,p.created_by,p.creation_date,p.last_update_by,p.last_update_date,p.po_quote_header_id,p.bu_org_id,o0.option_line_value quote_status,p.approval_status
